questions.question_text: To what extent is your business strategy driven by what you learn about your customers?
questions.immature_description: Customer experience is an afterthought when considering strategy.
questions.mature_description: Customer experience is at the core of every business decision.

questions.question_text: How do you know whether your customer strategy is successful?
questions.immature_description: There are only loosely defined goals and metrics are poorly defined.
questions.mature_description: Customer facing strategies has measurable goals and specific metrics.
